content: market day baby blanket a crochet pattern by ashley beals @everyday with ashley market day baby blanket finished size rectangle 34 x32 yarn and hook worsted weight machine washable yarn i used one ball of pound of love yardage approximately 1020 yards hook h/5mm gauge 4 = approx 16 sts/12 row worked in pattern while gauge is important for the yardage requirements of this pattern you can also play with the gauge as long as you keep in mind the yardage you have available *please note that if your gauge is significantly different that mine you may have altered yardage needs * contact have questions feel free to message me on instagram @everyday with ashley or email me everydaywithashley2021@gmail com abbreviations and special stitches chain - chain st/sts - stitch/stitches skip - skip single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch space/sps - space/sps market day baby blanket pattern chain 119 row 1 half_double_crochet in the 3rd chain from hook and each st across 117 half_double_crochet row 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st across row 3 repeat row 2 row 4 chain 1 half_double_crochet in first st ch1 skip 1 half_double_crochet in next st repeat from to across 59 half_double_crochet 58 chain 1 sps row 5 chain 1 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in chain 1 space half_double_crochet in next st repeat from to across 117 half_double_crochet row 6-7 repeat row 2 repeat row 4-7 until the blanket reaches 30 or desired dimensions for border single_crochet around the entire blanket placing 2-3 single_crochet in each corner stitch however many you need to keep the edge from curling and approximately 90 stitches along each side slip_stitch into starting single_crochet picot edge chain 1 skip 2 in the next st 3 double_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch into top two front bars of the 3rd double_crochet 3 double_crochet in same st skip 2 single_crochet repeat from to around *note - at the corners you may need to skip only 1 stitch instead of 2 in order to prevent curling depending on how many sts you skip at the corners and how many single_crochet sts you have in the row below you might have to adjust a bit to finish with a single_crochet slip_stitch to finish market day baby blanket finishing weave in ends wash and block play with this pattern try a different weight of yarn with a corresponding hook use different colors to stripe share your work i d love to see your completed baby blanket feel free to use the hashtags #marketdaybabyblanket and #ewapattern and tag me on instagram @everyday with ashley copyright 2023 by ashley beals please respect my copyright and do not share duplicate or sell this pattern without my permission thank you for knitting my design
